head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths HALLINAN, ARTHUR B.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths HALLINAN, ARTHUR B.

block.p: HALLINAN-Arthur B. Beloved husband of Patricia (nee Doran), loving father of Kathleen (David) Winkiel, Susan (Gediminis) Jomantas and Caroline (Mark) Ross. Cherished grandfather of Shannon & Mackenzie Winkiel and Thomas Jomantas. Dear brother of Gregory (Pauline). Visitation Monday 3-9 P.M. at Kisselburg-Wauconda Funeral Home, 235 N. Main Street, Wauconda, Illinois. Prayers start Tuesday 9:15 AM, from the funeral home to St. Peter Church, 27551 Volo Village Road, Volo, Illinois for Mass at 10:00 A.M. Interment St. Michael the Archangel Cemetery. Memorials to Wauconda Fire Department -Paramedic Fund 109 W. Liberty Street, Wauconda, Illinois 60084 or Make a Wish Foundation, 640 N. La Salle Street, Suite 280, Chicago, Illinois. For further information: 847-526-2115.
